sentences.en: Applied ranges: cars, motorcycles, compressor spare parts, hardware, machinery parts, etc.
sentences.cn: 应用范围: 汽车 、 摩托车 、 压缩机零配件, 五金 、 机械零件等.

sentences.en: Compressor may be reciprocating positive displacement or centrifugal.
sentences.cn: 压缩机可以是活塞式、螺杆式或离心式.

sentences.en: Convert by multiple compressor for converting WAV, AVI format.
sentences.cn: 转换为多元压缩机转换管理WAV, AVI格式.

sentences.en: For compressor, the optimal compressing process is the isothermal process.
sentences.cn: 对于压缩机来说, 等温压缩是最理想的压缩过程.

sentences.en: I have shut down my No 3 engine due to compressor surge.
sentences.cn: 我已关掉第三号发动机,因压缩器喘振.

sentences.en: In this paper, a new type positive displacement compressor is advanced.
sentences.cn: 提出一种新结构形式的变容压缩器.

sentences.en: Reformation of nitrogen seal of blast furnace gas compressor is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了高炉煤气压缩机采用氮气密封的改造.

sentences.en: Take compressor's intercooler for example, main reasons of failure is analyzed.
sentences.cn: 以压缩机管壳式冷却器为例, 分析了其失效原因.

sentences.en: The compressor - outlet pressure is nearly constant around the circumference.
sentences.cn: 压气机出口压力沿圆周方向接近于常数.

sentences.en: The drive gear, in turn, rotates the compressor gear.
sentences.cn: 驱动齿轮旋转, 带动产生增压的齿轮.

sentences.en: The refrigerating performance is primarily determined by refrigerating compressor.
sentences.cn: 制冷压缩机是制冷装置制冷性能的决定因素.

sentences.en: The surge occurs in the centrifugal compressor at a small flow rate.
sentences.cn: 喘振是离心压缩机在小流量工况时发生的不稳定流动状况.

sentences.en: They used an air compressor to take in atmospheric air , compress it, and force it into the cabin.
sentences.cn: 他们用一台空气压缩机把大气中的空气吸进来, 加以压缩, 然后送入船舱.

sentences.en: Two - side swash plate compressor is widely used in automotive air condition system.
sentences.cn: 双向 斜盘式压缩机是汽车空调系统中广泛使用的一种压缩机.

sentences.en: WARNING: Do not use for Reciprocating Air Compressor Service.
sentences.cn: 警告: 不要用于往复式空气压缩机管路.

trans.tran_en: a machine or part of a machine that compresses air or gas
